explains: adj. 永恒的；接连不断的
wordGroup: from everlasting 开天辟地以来，自古以来
everlasting love 永远的爱；不朽之爱
everlasting life 永生；[宗教]来世
from everlasting to everlasting 永远地

sentences.en: That is how I found myself on the road with four kids, a baby lamb and nothing but my everlasting optimism to see me through.
sentences.cn: 就这样，我上路了。带着四个孩子和一只小羊羔，以及支撑我走下去的永恒不变的乐观主义精神。

sentences.en: I'm tired of your everlasting complaints.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你没完没了的抱怨。

sentences.en: To his everlasting credit , he never told anyone what I'd done.
sentences.cn: 值得永远称赞的是他从未把我做的事告诉过任何人。
